page.title: 10Houses in our area.
page.content: {Edradynate}is a big house in our area where the owner of our estate lives and his name is Mr.Campbell.The house has fourteen bedrooms and two living rooms and one games room. A typical{farmhouse}in our area has about three or four rooms.Most farm houses are old,perhaps 100 years old.Most farms have buildings for machinery like combine harvesters. We have quite a lot of{cottages}in the area. Most of the cottages have four or five rooms. They have two bedrooms and a small living room. Most of the cottages are in Little Ballinluig. Two or three people can live in the cottages.
